org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.predict

Class MAEPredictMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.AbstractMetric<MAEPredictMetric.Context,MAEPredictMetric.AggregateResult,MAEPredictMetric.UserResult>
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.predict.MAEPredictMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Metric<MAEPredictMetric.Context>

    public class MAEPredictMetric
extends AbstractMetric<MAEPredictMetric.Context,MAEPredictMetric.AggregateResult,MAEPredictMetric.UserResult>

    Evaluate a recommender’s predictions by Mean Absolute Error. In general, prefer RMSE (RMSEPredictMetric) to MAE.

    This evaluator computes two variants of MAE. The first is by-rating, where the absolute error is averaged over all predictions. The second is by-user, where the MAE is computed per-user and then averaged over all users.

    • Method Detail

      • createContext

        public MAEPredictMetric.Context createContext(Attributed algo,
                                     TTDataSet ds,
                                     Recommender rec)
        Description copied from interface: Metric

        Create the context for an experimental condition (algorithm/data set pair).

        Parameters:
        algo - The algorithm.
        ds - The data set.
        rec - The LensKit recommender, if applicable. This can be null for an external algorithm that does not provide a LensKit recommender.
        Returns:
        The accumulator. This will be passed to Metric.measureUser(TestUser, Object). If the metric does not accumulate any results, this method can return null.

      • doMeasureUser

        public MAEPredictMetric.UserResult doMeasureUser(TestUser user,
                                        MAEPredictMetric.Context context)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric

        Measure a user with typed results.

        Specified by:
        doMeasureUser in class AbstractMetric<MAEPredictMetric.Context,MAEPredictMetric.AggregateResult,MAEPredictMetric.UserResult>
        Parameters:
        user - The user to measure.
        context - The context.
        Returns:
        The results of measuring the user, or null to emit NAs for the user.

      • getTypedResults

        protected MAEPredictMetric.AggregateResult getTypedResults(MAEPredictMetric.Context context)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric
